Meetings & Events
In the heart of the Water Street District, The Tampa EDITION brings together modern event venues, vibrant aesthetics and personalized service to create unforgettable experiences of any size and occasion. Our hotel offers over 8,000 square feet of private event space that can accommodate endless offerings — from sophisticated weddings to enchanting celebrations, professional functions and more.
View
capacity chart here
.
Submit Inquiry
For further information
Please contact
eventsales.tpa@editionhotels.com
or call 813-221-4600
Share
Meetings
Host your next event in Downtown Tampa’s premier meeting spaces. Our modern ballroom features cutting-edge audiovisual technology and is bathed in natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows. Delight your guests with tailored food and beverage options in a meeting space, or create a distinctive experience with lunch or dinner at one of our elevated restaurant venues.
Special Events
Whether you’re planning a personal celebration or a corporate milestone, celebrate with your guests in a bright and modern Ballroom, in one of our seven elegant restaurant and lounge venues, or surrounded by greenery on our Rooftop Pool Deck. Our expert event team will curate custom experiences, enhanced through personalized service and unparallelled food and beverage offerings.
Weddings
Your Happily Ever After begins at The Tampa EDITION. From the excitement of your engagement celebration to the final farewell brunch, let our wedding experts curate the perfect wedding weekend for you.
Ballroom
Located on the second level with city views from floor to ceiling windows, 18ft ceilings, and beautiful white oak floors. The entire ballroom is 3,257 square feet with a bright, modern airy feel and it connects directly to the Ballroom Pre-Function and outdoor Terrace.
Ballroom Prefunction
Featuring 18ft ceilings and light pouring in from the floor-to-ceiling windows, this space is the perfect preview to our Ballroom and connects directly to the outdoor Terrace.
Studios
Located on the second mezzanine level, this sophisticated event space features city views through floor to ceiling windows and luxurious white oak and travertine finishes throughout. Studio 1 & 2 are attached directly to the Studio Foyer.
Boardroom
A private Boardroom consisting of an elegant conference table that can accommodate 8-12 guests. This venue is complete with top-tier technology and a thoughtful interior design scheme of white oak built-ins with travertine details.
Garden Terrace
This private outdoor terrace atop the third floor, showcases lush greenery, towering greenwalls and breathtaking travertine accents.
Rooftop Pool Bar & Deck
This ninth-floor rooftop features panoramic views over downtown and sits amongst abundant greenery, including one-of-a-kind Japanese Blueberry Trees and plentiful blush Bougainvillea.
Azure at EDITION
Located on level nine, this venue welcomes you into an elevated setting anchored by a large white oak and marble racetrack bar and lined with intimate and private banquettes separated by slatted bleached oak screens. This venue also includes several outdoor terraces overlooking the Bay.
Arts Club
This venue combines a trio of spaces that come together to create a progressive experience. You are first welcomed into the lounge featuring a seductive backdrop of ebonized wood, black damask velvet sofas and black leather banquettes. From there, the green marble bar with its canary yellow stools is the perfect precursor before an evening of entertainment in the theater which boasts a ceiling of mirror balls, theatrical red velvet drapery and an intimate stage.
Punch Room
Located on the second level, this cozy muted venue features handsome walnut paneling, a double-sided fireplace, and bright-blue and green George Smith furniture.
Close

Meetings & Events
The Abu Dhabi EDITION provides a variety of flexible events spaces making it the ideal destination for event planners to host private meetings, conferences or exclusive gala dinners with delightful catering menu options to choose from. Our events team will assist you with every detail, making your event memorable.
Submit Inquiry
For further information
Please contact Events at +971 2 208 0000 or
events.auh@editionhotels.com
Share
Weddings
From initial menu tastings, engagement, and to your bespoke wedding dinner, let The Abu Dhabi EDITION craft an enchanting celebration that captures the magic of romance. Enjoy customized menus by seasoned culinarians, and a versatile ballroom space.
Meeting Rooms
Two intimate meeting rooms ideal for refined gatherings and break-out sessions and can accommodate up to 80 guests when combined.
Executive Boardroom
This sophisticated boardroom is outfitted with a custom oak table and state of the art AV. This space can be easily converted from a daytime boardroom meeting and intimate private dining room.
Pre-Function Space
The private event space also houses a pre-function area with two bridal suites and a Majlis as well as an executive boardroom, meeting rooms and business centre. The pre-function area of the Ballroom is ideal for receptions for up to 300 guests.
Ballroom
The 654 sq m Ballroom can host indoor receptions for up to 450 guests. The venue is accessible directly from the hotel lobby with flexible configurations.
